title:
H\"older regularity of solutions of degenerate parabolic equations of
  general dimension
abstract:
We establish the Alexandroff-Bakelman-Pucci estimate, the Harnack inequality,
the H\"older regularity and the Schauder estimates to a class of degenerate
parabolic equations of non-divergence form in all dimensions \begin{equation}
\mathcal{L}u:= u_t -Lu= u_t -(x a_{11} u_{xx} +2\sqrt{x} \sum_{j=2}^n a_{1j}
u_{x y_j} + \sum_{i,j=2}^n a_{ij} u_{y_i y_j} + b_1 u_x +\sum_{j=2}^n b_j
u_{y_j} ) =g\ \end{equation} on \(x \geq 0, y=(y_2,\ldots, y_n) \in
\mathbb{R}^{n-1}\), with bounded measurable coefficients.
